page.title: 10GAMES CHILDREN PLAY,PART 2
page.content: { Apart from the usual sort of games {that children play outside such as {cricket,rugby and soccer (association {football) there are also the more {imaginative sort such as Blocky 1-2-3, {War,Gestapo,British Bulldogs and {Harris Hunts. { Blocky 1-2-3 is a game that requires {one person to have a block or base.The {other players are given time to hide. {The Blocky is supposed to move from {his post to give the other players a {chance to return to the Block and {shout Blocky 1-2-3 and their name. { Harris Hunts is a game that requires {one player to get into a rage and run {away carrying something valuable to {the other players. If they manage to {catch him within ten minutes then he {has to pay a forfeit; if the children {are very rough they may make him hold {a nettle for five seconds.
